name: Space Shooter
description:
Become the best spaceship pilot with Space Shooter which is an arcade game that can quickly wake up your hardworking side

Space Shooter is an arcade game where you control a spaceship in space with a 2D view.
Your objective is to survive the flyings saucers and asteroids to complete the different levels, you will see that the levels will quickly become more complex.
You also have a survival mode where the difficulty gradually increases and your objective is to survive as long as possible to beat your best score and that of other players.

  • 6 increasingly difficult levels
  • 1 survival level
  • playable to the controller
  • ambient music
